text: Hello How Are You today ?
I'm good. I'm tired after an especially long day at work though. How about you?
same just trying to collect a donation for the Save the Children foundation as i will be donating as well
Do you work for them, or volunteer, or...something else?
i volunteer as well as i have 4 children of my own
Wow, I don't have any kids. They're not really my thing. What does Save the Children do? What are they saving the children from?
they help with needy familes in the us as well as needy children in countries that are needy as well
Oh, gotcha. So they are looking to help out kids in poor families. That's a good thing. Hopefully the funds are being handed out wisely.
its amazing because you can choose to sponsor a child here or another country or many other ways to donate.  URL here is the website to inform you a little more
I feel bad about needy kids in other countries, but worse about kids in my country. Even though I'm not a big fan of children.
would you like to donate to the charity? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2).
Probably not. I usually donate to places like the red cross. I feel like I can trust my donation will be put to good use through them.
are you sure, i mean how much money do they spend on unnecessary stuff like a bag of snack or candy?
I waste money on things like Starbucks, but I'm enjoying that money. I don't even like kids!!! :)

Small donations will indeed help a lot of children and their families.  Even $0.01, i will be donating as well every donation is essential to help ensuring children's rights to health, education, & safety. and will make a tangible impact for children all over.
How much are you donating? What country are you in?
i will be donating $0.50
That seems fairly generous of you.
i have even considered donating $2.00
I guess I could part with a little bit of money for a good cause like this. But not $2!
How much do you like to donate to the charity today?
I will donate ten cents.
Awesome thank you so much. bless you a child out there will greatly appreciate this
thank you. night.
